mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rm, a.*, b.userName from (select * from mv_board order by boardNo desc) a, mv_user b where a.userNo=b.userNo
)where rm between (#{pageStart}+1) and (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})

select a.*, b.userName from (select * from (select board.*
) where boardNo=#{boardNo} order by boardNo desc) a, mv_user b where a.userNo=b.userNo

select * from (select rownum rm, a.*, b.userName from (select * from mv_reply where boardNo=#{boardNo} order by commentDate desc) a, mv_user b where a.userNo = b.userNo ) where rm between (#{pageStart}+1) and (#{pageStart}+#{perPageNum})
select a.*,b.userName from (select * from mv_reply where boardNo=#{boardNo}) a,mv_user b where a.userNo=b.userNo

choose.when: status.boardGood, status.boardCall from mv_board board, board_status status where board.boardNo=status.boardNo
and (b.userName like ('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or a.boardTitle like ('%'||#{keyword}||'%') or a.boardNo like ('%'||#{keyword}||'%'))
, status.boardGood, status.boardCall from mv_board board, board_status status where board.boardNo=status.boardNo

, status.boardGood, status.boardCall, movie.boardRating,movie.movieNo, movieDB.movieNm from mv_board board, board_status status,board_movie movie,mv_movie movieDB where board.boardNo=status.boardNo and board.boardNo=movie.boardNo and movie.movieNo=movieDB.movieNo
, QandA.boardSecret, QandA.boardAnswer from mv_board board, board_QandA QandA where board.boardNo=QandA.boardNo
